haxel.HxlAnim

type
class

Constructor

public new(Name : String, Frames : Array<Int>, ?FrameRate : Float, ?Looped : Bool)
parameters
Name What this animation should be called (e.g. "run")
Frames An array of numbers indicating what frames to play in what order (e.g. 1, 2, 3)
FrameRate The speed in frames per second that the animation should play at (e.g. 40)
Looped Whether or not the animation is looped or just plays once
Constructor

Instance Variables

public delay : Float

Seconds between frames (basically the framerate)

public frames : Array<Int>

A list of frames stored as Int objects

public looped : Bool

Whether or not the animation is looped

public name : String

String name of the animation (e.g. "walk")
